issues.description: The getters for `lectureName` and `numberOfInscribedStudents` are declared private in the solution, but the problem statement explicitly asks students to implement public getters for each attribute (and tests will invoke them). This visibility mismatch will prevent students from accessing these methods and cause test failures.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the visibility of `getLectureName()` and `getNumberOfInscribedStudents()` to public so that students can access these methods and satisfy the test requirements.
